about_the_game:
This soundtrack contains 22 tracks (actually 23, since a track is in two parts), taking you on a journey through all the music in the game, in thematic rather than chronological order. As the game is fully open world anyway, there could not be a chronological order.

Here you will find a variety of tracks, from ambiant to high-energy, with a mixture of accoustic and electronic tones to encapsulate a sense of space and future as well as a deep connection to nature and to each other. Each track is based on one of the five big themes of the game, which are represented in music by leitmotifs. If you listen close enough, some clues and spoils might even be there...

This album will be updated at any given time with additional music, as soon as new audio content is added to the main game !

Here you will find a variety of tracks, from ambiant to high-energy, with a mixture of accoustic and electronic tones to encapsulate a sense of space and future as well as a deep connection to nature and to each other. Each track is based on one of the five big themes of the game, which are represented in music by leitmotifs. If you listen close enough, some clues and spoils might even be there...

This album will be updated at any given time with additional music, as soon as new audio content is added to the main game !

name: End Gate - The Last Passenger Soundtrack
short_description: Here is the full soundtrack of End Gate - The Last Passenger !Whether you've played the game and miss some of its music, or just want to travel through space and metaphysical ambiances, this is the place for you.
